Articles.Content:
One of my better cars. I call it the Stratos 7, but I'm still pretty uncertain about its name. Anyways, it's pretty cool in many aspects. Since its hull is partially made out of wings, it can really get some air and distance, and its wheels don't seem to break (I have a very light suspension going on). It uses a trick which gives it stability while driving and speed. It can drive far over 22 m/s, in fact, as fast until you break your wheels. It should turn stable up to 30 m/s, after that, its your own fault if you're not careful. Here's a gif thingy I found out about:

Here's it doing a jump with a ramp I threw together:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Its stable and pretty cool looking if you ask me. Check it out for yourself:

http://download1592./5gi9i17x0neg/9t2hsv73dzj24dz/Stratus+7.craft
excellent car you have there! minimum parts and maximum coverage with style to boot. though you wouldn't happen to have a cargo ssto able to take that to the mun would you?

I've made some cargo ssto's, but by now I've only built a 2 ton payload to duna. I don't know about this craft. I can probably throw one together by tomorrow. Also, I like your thinking.

Edited November 25, 2014 by manni01
Cool and clean design! Nice job
